item.description:
Mystical Meaning
of the
Christmas Story




Thursday, December 16th â€¢ 7:30 pm



If you desire a more meaningful Christmas this year, join us and start the season with an in-depth look at the inner meaning of Christmas and how you can experience a truly spiritual holy season.

Mystics interpret all the occurrences of Jesus and Mary's lives not only as literal events, but as symbolic steps along the spiritual path. In the Christmas story, Jesus and Mary represent specific aspects of us, as do Joseph, the wise men, the shepherds, the star, the stable animals and the stable itself.

Join us to learn this mystical meaning of the Christmas story and deepen your understanding of the greatest gift ever given to humanity.


Come and deepen your experience of Christmas.

There is no charge for this event.

Location:
Center of Light
844 Grand Avenue
New Haven




TO REGISTER
Rev Johanna 203.785.9085 or email RevJohanna@CentersOfLight.org

NewHaven.CentersOfLight.org

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Beautiful: The Mystical Meaning of the Christmas Story
